help.intro: Welcome to House Explorer! This game is a work in progress. Try these commands to interact with your environment:

BOTTOM_OF_DRIVEWAY.name: Bottom of Driveway
BOTTOM_OF_DRIVEWAY.description: You are standing at the bottom of a driveway. There is a mid-sized ranch house to the North with a large front yard with some trees and bushes. A large forest is to the South.

TOP_OF_DRIVEWAY.name: Top of Driveway
TOP_OF_DRIVEWAY.description: You are now directly in front of the house. The driveway is full of cracks and the house looks abandoned. A basketball hoop is mounted on the house. There is a path to the backyard to the North and the bottom of the driveway is to the South.

BACKYARD.name: The Backyard
BACKYARD.description: The grass in the backyard is patchy and worn. There is a patio in back of the house but the cement is cracked and overrun with weeds. Patio furniture is stacked by the back door. The driveway is to the West and the house is to the South.

INSIDE_HOUSE.name: The Kitchen
INSIDE_HOUSE.description: The kitchen is spick and span. A wood counter snakes along the perimeter of the room, interrupted by a refridgerator, stove, and oven. The door to the backyard is to the North.

FOREST_1.name: The Forest
FOREST_1.description: The trees around you are tall and thick. The ground is dry and covered in fallen leaves and branches. The air is cool and calm. The house is to your North, and the forest continues to the South.

FOREST_2.name: The Forest
FOREST_2.description: The canopy grows thicker, blocking out more sunlight. The forest continues to the North and there is a clearing further to the South.

CLEARING.name: A Clearing
CLEARING.description: You enter a small clearing in the forest. Shadows from the trees around you dance on the grass. The forest continues to the North.

HOUSE_FAR.description: The house has brick walls with white sidings. The house looks decrepit and there is no sign of anyone living here.

MAILBOX.description: This is a standard mailbox sitting on a wooden post.

LEAFLET.description: Welcome to House Explorer! This is a small tech demo built on the text-adventure game engine.

BASKETBALL.description: It is round and orange with bumps all over.
BASKETBALL.description_for_room: A basketball sits dejectedly on the side of the driveway.

HOUSE_NEAR.description: Several windows are boarded up, the rest are covered in grime. The bushes around the house are overgrown.

FOREST_TREE.description: There are a lot of those around.

FOREST_TREES.description: The trees tower up into the sky. Their branches stretch to form a canopy, blocking sunlight.

FRED_GOUDA.description: The slice of aged cheese gives off a soft, tangy aroma and appears to be half-eaten.

PLAYER_GOUDA.name: piece of Fred's prized Gouda cheese
keywords: piece of fred's prized gouda cheese
PLAYER_GOUDA.description: This piece of Gouda from Fred smells delicious.

HOUSE_BACK.description: There are a few windows on the back of the house, each hastily boarded up. It's clear the house has been abandoned for some time.

PATIO_FURNITURE.description: The metal chairs sit in a neat stack. Rust has begun to set in.

BASEBALL_BAT.description: The bat is metal, painted red with a black grip.
BASEBALL_BAT.description_for_room: A baseball bat is leaned up against the house.

FOREST_CHEST_KEY.description: This rusty bronze key appears to be very old. It has a small circle inscribed on the handle.
FOREST_CHEST_KEY.description_for_room: A rusty key sits on the counter.

FOREST_CHEST.description: The wood planks making up the sides of the chest are faded and worn. The top of the chest is engraved with a circle.
FOREST_CHEST.description_for_room: A large wooden chest sits by the base of a tree.

FRED_THE_TYROMANCER.name: Wizard
FRED_THE_TYROMANCER.description: The wizard is leaning on a tree, seemingly lost in thought. He is wearing a long purple robe and has a slice of Gouda in his hand. He seems harmless enough.
FRED_THE_TYROMANCER.description_for_room: A wizard is here. He pays no attention to your arrival.

dialog.greeting: The wizard looks towards you but says nothing.

FRED1_NAME.response: I am a man of many names, but there are those who call me Fred.

effects.description_for_room: Fred the Tyromancer is here, leaning against a tree.

FRED1_SPELLS.choice: Can you teach me some spells?
FRED1_SPELLS.response: Alas, I cannot. I am a tyromancer, a wizard gifted with skills of divination through coagulated dairy products.

FRED1_CHEESE_MAGIC.choice: Wait, so you do magic with cheese?
FRED1_CHEESE_MAGIC.response: Your question betrays your own ignorance, but that description is not altogether unfitting.

FRED1_ASK_FOR_CHEESE.choice: Can I have that piece of cheese?
FRED1_ASK_FOR_CHEESE.response: This is a wedge of my prized Gouda, so I'm afraid not.

FRED1_GIVE_CHEESE.choice: Come on, please? It looks delicious...
FRED1_GIVE_CHEESE.response: My, you are persistent. I shall give you a piece but that shall be the only one.
